title: Ttelas
author: Ttelas
content: Kylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer??

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Ttelas on December 05, 2022, 09:39:14 AMKylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer?? I think Messi needs just one goal to pass the legend Batistuta who is the top goal scorer for Argentina and I think Messi will score against the Netherlands as they are not well known for having a solid defense,that was always their Achilles's heel where they suffered a lot from the not so good defending.Argentina is well known for scoring goals and most probably will score against Netherlands with Messi having a really high chance of becoming the best goal scorer as I think Mbappe will have difficulties to score that easily against England but we will see.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: Ttelas on December 05, 2022, 09:39:14 AMKylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer?? Cody Gakpo has all the advantage for the Golden Boot. I see the Dutch team going as far as the semi-finals or finals. I would pick Ronaldo, Rashford and Richardson of Brazil to compete for the golden boot. I do not see Messi in the race for the golden boot but I see him winning the most valuable player in the competition due to his leadership qualities and skills he has portrayed in the tournament so far.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: In the list of top goal scorers for this world cup Qatar 2022, Mbappe is topping the list with 5 goals already and the rest following in the train are from 3 goals below including Messi. So I think kylian Mbappe has a greater chance to going home with the golden boot. The France team is strongly leading their world cup campaign, being in the race they Mbappe is my choice for the highest goal scorer this world cup.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: Ttelas on December 05, 2022, 09:39:14 AMKylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer?? in my opinion it is quite clear that Mbappe is the one with the greatest chances of scoring many more goals than all players on this list, looking at mbappe's performance in this world cup, he scored 2 goals in his last game, and if this trend if he stays then he will score a goal against england, and if they go through to another stage he will score a goal, so he is the player who has the best chances of overcoming all the players on this list, messi will have to work hard in today's game, because the opponent is very strong and argentina has some problems in the defense on certain occasions, but in relation to the attack they have not wasted many opportunities, in fact the few opportunities they create score a goal, but the netherlands are not a weak team, they even can beat argentina

comments.author: BigBos
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on December 05, 2022, 11:56:24 AMIn the list of top goal scorers for this world cup Qatar 2022, Mbappe is topping the list with 5 goals already and the rest following in the train are from 3 goals below including Messi. So I think kylian Mbappe has a greater chance to going home with the golden boot. The France team is strongly leading their world cup campaign, being in the race they Mbappe is my choice for the highest goal scorer this world cup.Even though Kylian Mbappe is the temporary top scorer in this world cup with five goals, in my opinion, it is still too early to say that Kylian Mbappe has the potential to become the top scorer in the Qatar world cup, the match has not yet reached a very tense moment, France is still in the rankings In the last 8 and Mbappe's goal difference is only two goals from all the players who enter the goal statistics, maybe Mbappe's steps will be stopped by England in the next match, considering that England also has Bukayo Saka and Marcus Rashford with three goals.

comments.author: jakdanyel
comments.body: Quote from: BigBos on December 05, 2022, 03:26:36 PMQuote from: Gozie51 on December 05, 2022, 11:56:24 AMIn the list of top goal scorers for this world cup Qatar 2022, Mbappe is topping the list with 5 goals already and the rest following in the train are from 3 goals below including Messi. So I think kylian Mbappe has a greater chance to going home with the golden boot. The France team is strongly leading their world cup campaign, being in the race they Mbappe is my choice for the highest goal scorer this world cup.Even though Kylian Mbappe is the temporary top scorer in this world cup with five goals, in my opinion, it is still too early to say that Kylian Mbappe has the potential to become the top scorer in the Qatar world cup, the match has not yet reached a very tense moment, France is still in the rankings In the last 8 and Mbappe's goal difference is only two goals from all the players who enter the goal statistics, maybe Mbappe's steps will be stopped by England in the next match, considering that England also has Bukayo Saka and Marcus Rashford with three goals.The most ambitious candidate for the top scorer, not only for this world cup, but also for the next cups, is Mbappe. He is only 23 years old. If there are no major setbacks, he will play in 3 more world cups. I think he will score more goals in the history of the world cup than Miroslav Klose, who scored 16 goals. He's such a goal machine!

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: BigBos on December 05, 2022, 03:26:36 PMQuote from: Gozie51 on December 05, 2022, 11:56:24 AMIn the list of top goal scorers for this world cup Qatar 2022, Mbappe is topping the list with 5 goals already and the rest following in the train are from 3 goals below including Messi. So I think kylian Mbappe has a greater chance to going home with the golden boot. The France team is strongly leading their world cup campaign, being in the race they Mbappe is my choice for the highest goal scorer this world cup.Even though Kylian Mbappe is the temporary top scorer in this world cup with five goals, in my opinion, it is still too early to say that Kylian Mbappe has the potential to become the top scorer in the Qatar world cup, the match has not yet reached a very tense moment, France is still in the rankings In the last 8 and Mbappe's goal difference is only two goals from all the players who enter the goal statistics, maybe Mbappe's steps will be stopped by England in the next match, considering that England also has Bukayo Saka and Marcus Rashford with three goals.in my opinion, it also depends on the games that their team will be played. so yes, if france will be stopped, then, how can he make more goals? so let's see if this young athlete can make the most in this world cup. but yes, i can agree that he can very well play in the next world cups as he is still young. he maybe the next sensation to look forward to in the football sports.

comments.author: rahmad2nd
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on December 05, 2022, 09:54:32 AMI think Messi needs just one goal to pass the legend Batistuta who is the top goal scorer for Argentina and I think Messi will score against the Netherlands as they are not well known for having a solid defense,that was always their Achilles's heel where they suffered a lot from the not so good defending.Argentina is well known for scoring goals and most probably will score against Netherlands with Messi having a really high chance of becoming the best goal scorer as I think Mbappe will have difficulties to score that easily against England but we will see.In Messi's several matches with Argentina in this world cup, he had many opportunities that could not be converted into goals.Â  one of them, when he had a chance at the penalty spot against Poland. he failed, at least, Messi has 2-4 shots on target every game. Messi could have been the top scorer, if every opportunity he had could be converted properly. even so, I can understand that at the age of 35 years, the sharpness and accuracy are decreasing.by the way, don't underestimate the Netherlands. because after all, so far the Netherlands has appeared very nicely. they have quite solid teamwork, a front line whose sharpness should not be underestimated.Too bad the Netherlands had to meet Argentina. both teams, this is my farovit. Messi still has the opportunity to add to his coffers on condition that he must score against the Netherlands. unfortunately, Argentina will meet Brazil if these two teams both qualify for the quarter-finals.For Mbappe, I agree with you.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on December 05, 2022, 09:54:32 AMQuote from: Ttelas on December 05, 2022, 09:39:14 AMKylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer?? I think Messi needs just one goal to pass the legend Batistuta who is the top goal scorer for Argentina and I think Messi will score against the Netherlands as they are not well known for having a solid defense,that was always their Achilles's heel where they suffered a lot from the not so good defending.Argentina is well known for scoring goals and most probably will score against Netherlands with Messi having a really high chance of becoming the best goal scorer as I think Mbappe will have difficulties to score that easily against England but we will see.In this world cup so far Mbappe looks to be way more aggressive than Messi and is likely to score more from this point on.Â  I like France's chance to move deep into this tourny than Argentina.Â  Mbappe is definitely ready to take the reigns of "best player" from Messi and Ronaldo.Â  We are witnessing the passing of the torch.Â  This kid might end up better than both of them.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Ttelas on December 05, 2022, 09:39:14 AMKylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer?? Seeing the topic, I felt that the discussion was mainly about this World Cup and the current highest goal scorer, I was about to discuss Rashford and how Southgate did him dirty not starting him in their last game so he could have had the opportunity to increase huis current goals in this world cup from three goals to a level position with Mbappe, he has that ability and is also currently enjoying a good form.In general, where Mbappe will put the record of highest goal scorer in all world cup games, will be difficult to beat.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: Quote from: Ttelas on December 05, 2022, 09:39:14 AMKylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer?? I think it is between Messi and Mbappe to become the best player in this world cup but Messi is not performing like he is in the youth and Mbappe is still very young to go for it with support of the team mate. Some players score today to still make move in the highest scorer spot. Richarlison of Brazil now in 3 goals scoring on 4-1 victory against South Korea. The numbers to compete will increase when it is in semi finals.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: With four players tieing on 9 goals that'll be hard to determine at this stage who'll be the highest goal scorer However any team on the list that finds its way to the semi final and to final could get their player the golden bootIt'll be a huge respect to Messi if he gets the golden boot in respect to his last world cup game.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Quote from: gantez on December 05, 2022, 09:10:14 PMQuote from: Ttelas on December 05, 2022, 09:39:14 AMKylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer?? I think it is between Messi and Mbappe to become the best player in this world cup but Messi is not performing like he is in the youth and Mbappe is still very young to go for it with support of the team mate. Some players score today to still make move in the highest scorer spot. Richarlison of Brazil now in 3 goals scoring on 4-1 victory against South Korea. The numbers to compete will increase when it is in semi finals.This is a good standing between Messi and Mbappe, we cannot deny that Messi is still performing good despite of his age and its also good to see the younger generation with Mbappe and for sure he can still score more as the world cup is far from its end. Letâ€™s see if other players will also enter the top list, as we can see anything can happen and there might be big changes as they start to play in the next round.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: crzy on December 05, 2022, 09:19:32 PMQuote from: gantez on December 05, 2022, 09:10:14 PMQuote from: Ttelas on December 05, 2022, 09:39:14 AMKylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer?? I think it is between Messi and Mbappe to become the best player in this world cup but Messi is not performing like he is in the youth and Mbappe is still very young to go for it with support of the team mate. Some players score today to still make move in the highest scorer spot. Richarlison of Brazil now in 3 goals scoring on 4-1 victory against South Korea. The numbers to compete will increase when it is in semi finals.This is a good standing between Messi and Mbappe, we cannot deny that Messi is still performing good despite of his age and its also good to see the younger generation with Mbappe and for sure he can still score more as the world cup is far from its end. Letâ€™s see if other players will also enter the top list, as we can see anything can happen and there might be big changes as they start to play in the next round. I agree with you, Messi is doing very well not minding that he is getting old, I am predicting that he will be the highest goal scorer in this world cup.Though I am looking forward to the next match which is between Argentina and Netherlands on the 9th of December, hopefully he will put more goals behind those bars..He is one of the best players and I personally love him and his style of play, and when I saw this topic, I knew that there was no way he wouldnt make the list, I am hoping he comes out top in the end.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: Quote from: Ttelas on December 05, 2022, 09:39:14 AMKylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer?? I'm not good at predicting but I'm sure Mbappe will add another goal in the match against England later in the quarter-finals, I think the France vs England match will have a lot of goals scored, Messi won't be able to catch up with that of course if Argentina loses against the Netherlands later

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: The four players that are on equal goals are from countries capable of being the world cup winners but I think the top goal scorer will be determined by the performance of the best two countries that may likely play the final of the game. Going by the performance of the teams and the individual performance of the players listed by the op,Â  I think my prediction will be in favour of Mbappe or Messi because one out of the two countries are likely to play in the finals, and with their recent form and goal scoring ability they are likely to score in their next games and if they get to semi-finals it then means that the award of the highest goals scorer will be given to one of them.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on December 05, 2022, 09:34:42 PMThough I am looking forward to the next match which is between Argentina and Netherlands on the 9th of December, hopefully he will put more goals behind those bars..I don't think Messi will find it very easy scoring to meet up with Mbappe in the next match. The Dutch side is not going to be free scoring for Argentina because they only conceive one goal from the group stage and they top the table with 7 points, they have good forward to attack the Argentina defence on counter if they open up any such opportunity. So Messi will get difficulty in scoring freely.

comments.body: Quote from: Ttelas on December 05, 2022, 09:39:14 AMKylian Mbappe scores his 9th World Cup goal ðŸ˜³ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· Mbappe - 9ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡· Messi - 9ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ Villa - 9ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ Baggio - 9He now has more than Cristiano Ronaldo & Maradona ðŸ˜….Â  Â  Â The world cup is still going on ...who do you think will win the highest goal scorer?? I vote Mbappe, this man is unstoppable, in every matches at this world cup performance Mbappe very impressive. Two score difference now with other players is a good record, we will see him scored again in the next match to stay away from them.Quote from: bitcampaign on December 05, 2022, 09:44:29 PMI'm not good at predicting but I'm sure Mbappe will add another goal in the match against England later in the quarter-finals, I think the France vs England match will have a lot of goals scored, Messi won't be able to catch up with that of course if Argentina loses against the Netherlands laterGiroud also might still be able to score in match against England, so there are another possibilities on the French player side to get Golden Shoe. It seems you're right, Messi will not be able to catch up Mbappe with 2 score difference in this world cup against other strong teams will be difficult for him.

comments.author: Newlifebtc
comments.body: Are you sure that that the analysis is very correct because I think that you are miss understanding since attending there or missing some certain point because all the countries I believe so you dream perfectly well if that statistics Union that there is perfect I think many people were really discuss about it
